## Hello World
Start a `Node.js` terminal

```bash
node
```

Load a Javascript file

---
# nodejsrepl
---

```default
Welcome to Node.js v18.16.1.
Type ".help" for more information.
> .load hello.js
```

where `hello.js`

```js
console.log("Hello World!")
```

Exit `Node.js` terminal

```default
.exit
```
